parliamentary.service.title: Parliamentary Service
parliamentary.service.para: Elected to the Senate for Queensland 2010 (term began 1.7.2011).

committee.service.title: Committee Service
committee.service.para: Senate Standing: Senators' Interests from 5.7.11 to 11.11.13.
Senate Legislative and General Purpose Standing: Environment and Communications: Legislation and References Committees from 5.7.11.
Senate Select: Certain Aspects of Queensland Government Administration related to Commonwealth Government Affairs from 2.10.14.

parliamentary.party.positions.title: Parliamentary Party Positions
parliamentary.party.positions.para: Co-Deputy Leader of the Australian Greens from 6.5.15.
Australian Greens portfolios: Environment and Biodiversity; Women; Resources, Mining and Coal Seam Gas.

party.positions.title: Party Positions
party.positions.para: Spokesperson on Environment and Justice, Queensland Greens 2007-09.
Convener, Queensland Greens North Brisbrane Branch 2006-07.

quals.work.pre.parliament.title: Qualifications and Occupation before entering Federal Parliament
quals.work.pre.parliament.para: Legal researcher, Land and Resources Tribunal 2000-01.
Community environmental lawyer, Environmental Defender's Office (Qld) 2002-11.
